description.value:
Grants +20 to Interrogation and Charm Tests against Prone or Restrained Targets. Consists of flexible nano-sharp spikes in the fingernails that can reach into a target's nerves, causing horrific pain or pleasure, as the user desires.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
